about_the_game:
You must have chapters 1, 2, and 3 installed to access chapter 4.


Thalos, the world’s oldest vampire, and Dusty, the leader of the vampire hunters, must work together to destroy the insidious vampire Johann. Thalos felt a sublime attachment to Dusty ever since he accidentally made Dusty his familiar. Can love blossom between vampire and hunter?



The thrilling conclusion to the Vampire Slave saga! Both Thalos and Dusty are brought to their darkest hour at the hands of Johann and his vampire army. Is Thalos willing to resurrect the leader of the vampire hunters as a vampire if Johann kills him? How many more people must Dusty lose before Johann is stopped?

All they want is each other, but the fates align to drive them apart! Is the universe declaring their unholy union was never meant to be?

Players can have all text read out loud by pressing 'v' on their keyboards.

content_descriptors.notes: Illustrations that imply sexual conduct, more explicit than in past chapters. Blood, torture, and potentially horrifying scenes.  Alcohol use and self-harm.
